description: This PHP script handles wireless network configuration updates via POST requests. It adjusts settings such as SSID enable status, encryption mode, security keys, network name, broadcast SSID, WMM settings, radio enablement, and other wireless parameters. It also includes functions to restart specific SSID configurations.

methods.name: MiniApplySSID
methods.description: Applies settings to a specific SSID by setting appropriate device parameters and restarting the SSID configuration.
